steps: Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Grill the chicken for 5-7 minutes on each side until cooked through.
Toss the salad greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion in a bowl.
Slice the grilled chicken and add it to the salad.
Drizzle with your favorite dressing and serve.
Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Chop the vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, onions) and toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Roast the vegetables for 25-30 minutes, stirring halfway through.
Cook the quinoa according to package instructions.
Combine roasted vegetables and quinoa in a large bowl, add lemon juice, and mix well.
Grate the cauliflower to make rice-sized pieces.
Heat a pan with olive oil and sauté garlic, onion, and any other vegetables you prefer.
Add the cauliflower rice and cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Season with soy sauce, sesame oil, and your favorite stir-fry spices.
Garnish with green onions and serve.
Heat olive oil in a pot and sauté onions and garlic until soft.
Add the canned chickpeas, spinach, vegetable broth, and spices.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes, letting the flavors meld together.
Blend the soup until smooth, or leave some chunks for texture.
Serve hot with a sprinkle of fresh herbs.
